response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to exceed expectations and deliver unparalleled performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $10,000. We are offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $12,000. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you experience the best without compromising on value. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further details about the product. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
